name: Michael Brown
text: Went to the location and no business signs were there, assume it went out of business?

name: Kevin Barnette
text: The one phone call that I made the guy I talkednto was very polite. He was very helpful and if I didn't live so far away I would trade with him next year.

name: Monique Anderson
text: Was not happy with prices given..tried to say pecans were a year old when they were not...woman was rude !

name: John Lott
text: Low pric

name: Melinda Williams Peak
text: Love working here🥜

name: Chris Withers
text: AWESOME PLACE TO  WORK GOOD HOURS AND EXCELLENT BENEFITS

name: Sebastien Lambert
text: Lazy people, even after break is over I don't see trucks getting loaded, workers just chilling outside of cold storage

name: Gealach1990
text: Great place to work, we strive to be safe for our employees and produce quality product for our customers

name: rolloverriderpgr
text: Great place to load, I and out like a duck!

name: Tim Kelley
text: Looks like a good place to work.

name: Paul H
text: Easy to find and very friendly staff

name: Kyler Strickland
text: I work here good pay and good hours

name: Gustavo Sanchez
text:
(Translated by Google) Friendly and helpful people

(Original)
Gente amable y servicial

name: Rose Marie
text: This is where I get fresh pecans every year for Christmas fruitcakes and other holiday baking. The pecans are plump and flavorful, and give a tasty crunch to brownies, fudge, cakes and cookies. I buy extra to keep in the freezer to add to cookies and breakfast oatmeal during the year. They also sell jams, jellies, honey, peanuts, etc. Family owned and operated.

name: Darlene Brunson
text: A great place to purchase or sell pecans.  They have great nuts, candy and harvested products of the season.  They are always kind, friendly and very informative.   We took our own pecans in to be cracked and blown; best thing ever, after picking up nearly 100 lbs of nuts.

name: Michael Cannon
text: Good selection. Everything we bought was excellent. Well run family business

name: Jennifer Jenkins
text: I was so happy to make that stop! Pecan heaven!

name: Elizabeth Zachry
text: The owner runs the place and is quite helpful.

name: Larry Forrester
text:
Always a friendly staff with fair pricing.
Easy to locate and easy in and out parking.

name: Susan Carlisle
text: Great price

name: Emily Williams
text: Friendly, knowledgeable staff

name: Dwayne Buggs
text: The Louisville Pecan Company pecan halves and pieces are the best quality that one can buy. I have enjoyed them for over seven years.

name: Creek's Lawn Care
text: This Christmas, I received two bags of Chocolate and two bags of White Chocolate covered pecans. I absolutely love them. I'm finishing off the last bag of White Chocolate tonight. Thank you for your commitment to making a quality product.

name: InterstateBullly Enygunna
text: They work with you to get loaded with a decent weight.

name: Pamela Queen
text: Best pecans I have ever bought! My family always requests my homemade pecan pie for Thanksgiving!

name: Susan Raster
text:
We have been buying these pecans for years.  They are great for baking, but we love them plain just to snack on. They are always requested by our friends and family.
Thank you for making them available.

name: Claudia Washington
text: I live in Michigan best pecan ever.

name: Judy Ivey
text:
As a one time business owner, Louisville Pecan Co. always shipped my order quickly with the freshest pecans and exactly the amounts I had ordered.  Our business grew which required us to order more often and, as before, we were shipped the best tasting pecans and our orders were always correct and shipped in a timely fashion.  Thank you!

Judy Ivey
A Tasters Choice Catering, LLC
Shreveport, LA

name: Victor Griffin
text: This place has the best pecans in the area!!! You can get bits and pieces, halves, chocolate covered, candied, and many other types. They come in small package to large cases. They also can't be bought in gift boxes or even decorative tins. The prices are great and don't forget to ask about free shipping!!!!! Thank you Louisville Pecan for having such a great product!!!!!! Hurry and order them now!!!!!!

name: Rody Daw
text: Good place to sell, crack, or shell your pecans! Fair. I'd been taking my pecans to Holmes Pecans. But although Holmes sometimes pay more per lb, in turn Holmes has never accepted my pecans this year... Thanks B&B! Look forward to next years harvest!

name: Betsy Norris
text: I loved it! Great people! Great local honey!
